import Input from './input' import Countdown, { zeroPad } from 'react-countdown' import { useState } from 'react' import { ethers } from 'ethers' export default function Vault({ signer, contract, token, balance }) { const [tokenAmount, setTokenAmount] = useState(0) const getTokenAmount = (amount) => { setTokenAmount(amount) } const handleApprove = async () => { await token.contract.approve(window.ethereum.selectedAddress, tokenAmount) } const handleDeposit = async () => { // const tx = await contract.Deposit(ethers.utils.parseEther(tokenAmount)) // tx.wait().then((res) => console.log(res)) console.log(ethers.utils.parseEther(tokenAmount)) } return (

Yield Guild Prize Pool

(

{zeroPad(props.days)}

DAY

{zeroPad(props.hours)}

HR

{zeroPad(props.minutes)}

MIN

{zeroPad(props.seconds)}

SEC

)} />
) }
